3.45 pm: Afternoon, Josh Halliday here taking over from Matthew Weaver . This just in: Chancellor George Osborne has been defending Andy Coulson .`` Andy Coulson did a good job as director of communications,'' he said. There was never any complaints about how he did that job- which is pretty unique when you look at the people who've done that job in the past.
